price: (10) And they disobeyed the messenger of their Lord, so He seized them with a seizure exceeding [in severity].
arabic: فَعَصَوۡاْ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ أَخۡذَةٗ رَّابِيَةً

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: faʿaṣaw rasūla rabbihim fa-akhadhahum akhdhatan rābiyatan
